patthana24.21:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:2.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:2.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:3.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:3.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:4.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:4.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:5.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:5.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:6.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.21:6.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
